section.name: bLight Maven plugin
section.p: The bLight Maven plugin is used to pre-compile templates.
Add the plugin to the build plugins section of your pom.xml.

By default, the plugin is executed in Maven's process-classes phase, after the main application classes have been compiled. To allow on-demand compilation during development, add <phase>pre-package</phase> to the executionelement.
The bLight Maven plugin can be configured using the parameters below. Note: Only the packageNames parameter is required, the rest are optional.

tr.td: A list of package names to compile.
The directory to place compiled templates source code.
The name of the template method. Only this method will have comments replaced with executable code.
The prefix to insert before each comment replacement.
The suffix to insert before each comment replacement.
Extra code to insert into the compiled template. This will be executed in an initialiser block.
